tasks.task: Designed and implemented the Prisma schema to manage users, runs, marathons, and notification preferences.
Integrated third-party APIs: Speedrun.com, Reddit, Twitch, and Horaro.org to fetch real-time data.
Containerized the development environment using Docker (Node.js + PostgreSQL).
Built the landing page and complementary website to view news and marathons via a web browser.
Deployed with Next.js and Tailwind CSS, including basic SEO to improve visibility.

projects.name: SpeedRunHub
projects.description: iOS/Android mobile application & website dedicated to news, events and the practice of speedrunning in the field of video games.

tasks.task: Developed custom hooks in React Native for better code consistency and maintainability.
Used Redux for centralized state management, improving application stability and predictability.
Managed deployments to the application stores, ensuring uninterrupted global access.
Implemented internationalization with i18next, expanding the multilingual accessibility of the application.
Secured the Node.js API with dedicated middleware, strengthening data protection.
Configured Docker to simplify deployment and ensure consistency across environments.
Improved MariaDB performance with Sequelize, maximizing responsiveness and data reliability.

projects.name: VideoTek
projects.description: Mobile application for iOS/Android, specially designed for fans of the world of cinema and television series.

tasks.task: Implemented Redux for centralized state management, increasing the predictability and stability of the mobile application.
Configured the Docker development environment, improving the development workflow and ensuring consistency across environments.
Deployed the API to a development server, facilitating ongoing feature integration and testing.
Enhanced Node.js API security with specialized middleware, securing data and preventing unauthorized access.
Improved MariaDB database performance with Sequelize, maximizing responsiveness and reliability of data transactions.

projects.name: Confort Electrique
projects.description: Development of a centralized back office to improve data management and processes.

tasks.task: Designed custom hooks for React Native, improving the consistency and maintainability of the mobile app code.
Integrated Redux for centralized state management, increasing the reliability and predictability of the mobile application.
Lead the implementation of a back office for administrators using React.js, with the adoption of PrimeReact for a rich and intuitive user interface.
Ensured the configuration of the Docker development environment, optimizing the development workflow and environmental parity.
Deployed the API on a development server, ensuring continuous integration and agile testing of features in real time.
Secured the Node.js API via robust middleware, minimizing vulnerabilities and ensuring user data protection.
Worked closely with Sequelize to fine-tune MariaDB database performance, leading to faster and more reliable data transactions.

projects.name: XSOCharge
projects.description: Mobile application for iOS/Android offering electric vehicle charging tracking.

tasks.task: Designed custom hooks for React Native, improving the consistency and maintainability of the mobile app code.

projects.name: Robots Bar
projects.description: Implement a React interface for customer ordering on a robotic bar.
